description:
below the function:
nova/compute/api.py 
def _validate_bdm(self, context, instance, instance_type, all_mappings):

the value transfer to 'all_mappings' is 'block_device_mapping', so change 'all_mappings' to 'block_device_mapping' will be easier to understand
title: all_mappings

comments.content:
below the function:
nova/compute/api.py 
def _validate_bdm(self, context, instance, instance_type, all_mappings):

the value transfer to 'all_mappings' is 'block_device_mapping', so change 'all_mappings' to 'block_device_mapping' will be easier to understand
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~huangpengtao

comments.content:
@huangpengtaohw:

Thanks for this bug report. Naming variables in a readable and 
understandable way is important and improves a lot the maintainability
of the code. The change you suggested is a refactoring and doesn't need
a bug report in my opinion. I'll close this bug report as "Invalid" 
because it is not needed anymore. Just push the change you want to see 
to Gerrit and make sure you explain in the commit message that this is a
refactoring.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
